item.title: physics619
item.description: Applied Photonics - physics619 Course Applied Photonics Course No. physics619 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises English 3+1 6 WT Requirements: Preparation: Form of Testing and Examination: Requirements for the examination (written or oral): successful work with the exercises Length of Course: 1 semester Aims of the Course: To make the students understand physical and technological foundations of photonics and enable them to practically apply their knowledge in research and development.
